abstract: The billionaire’s investments in railroads are relatively recent.
snippet: The billionaire’s investments in railroads are relatively recent.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s investments in railroads are relatively recent. In fact, it was not until 2006 that Mr. Buffett’s holding company, Berkshire Hathaway, began building a stake in the industry. Despite the economic downturn, Mr. Buffett continued to build his position in many of the major railroads in the United States – concentrating most of his investment in Burlington Northern Santa Fe, which he agreed to acquired fully on Tuesday for $26 billion in cash and stock.

headline.main: Buffett’s Record of Buying Railroad Stocks
